greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of set partitions of [n] where each subset is again partitioned into three nonempty subsets.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..501
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[a[n - j] Binomial[n - 1, j -1] StirlingS2[j, 3], {j, 3, n}]];
a /@ Range[0, 25] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 16 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 14 2019
